establishedMeasure: Has your country established legislative, administrative or policy measures on ABS? {establishedMeasuresInclude}

article53Implemented: Does your country have measures in place requiring that benefits from the utilization of genetic resources, as well as subsequent applications and commercialization, be shared with the Party providing such resources?
article55Implemented: Has your country taken measures in order that benefits arising from the utilization of traditional knowledge associated with genetic resources are shared with indigenous peoples and local communities holding such knowledge?
